sense.def: Pathological Condition of li ji 痢疾 , free-flux illness, where moisture qi troubles the spleen. It is accompanied by a feeling of heaviness in the body, abdominal distension, fatigue and lack of strength, as well as lack of appetite. Qi xiao liang fang 奇效良方 13 濕痢久不斷，體瘦多 昏，坐則閉目，食不下 , “ Moisture free - flux illness that cannot be stopped for a long time. The body is emaciated and often [patients are] mentally disturbed. When they sit down, they close their eyes. They cannot eat”.
